row.process:
:SET &variableName# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_TOMCAT.PRV.VARA.TEMP.LIST_APPLICATIONS_RESULT.&$ACTIVATOR_RUNID#.&$PHYS_DATE_YYYYMMDD#" :SET &variablePath# = ""
:SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*") :PROCESS &hnd#
: SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &line# = STR_TRIM(&line#)
: SET &is_ok# = STR_FIND(&line#, "OK - Listed applications") : IF &is_ok# <> 0 :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CREATE_PASS_VALUES_VARIABLE : IF &ret# <> 0 : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE = &ret# : PRINT "Unable to create new variable object: UC4_RB_OUT_APPLICATIONS_&$ACTIVATOR_RUNID#" : ELSE : DEFINE &list_app#, string, 1000 : FILL &list_app#[] = STR_SPLIT(&line#,"/") : SET &app_count# = 2 : DEFINE &app_info#, string, 4 : WHILE &list_app#[&app_count#] > ""
: FILL &app_info#[] = STR_SPLIT(&list_app#[&app_count#],":") : SET &app_name# = &app_info#[4] : SET &app_status# = &app_info#[2] : IF &app_status# = "running" OR "stopped" : PUT_VAR &variableName#, "&app_name#", "&app_status#" : ELSE : PUT_VAR &variableName#, "ROOT", "&app_info#[1]" : ENDIF : SET &app_count# = &app_count# + 1
: ENDWHILE
: ENDIF : ENDIF
:ENDPROCESS
:PSET &UC4RB_OUT_TC_LIST_APPS# = "&variableName#"
